buffer.description: The id (JSON property name) of the buffer.

byteOffset.description: The offset into the buffer, in bytes.

byteLength.description: The length of the buffer-view, in bytes.

name.description: The user-defined name of this buffer-view.  This is not necessarily unique among buffer-view.

target.description: 34962 (ARRAY_BUFFER) or 34963 (ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER). When not provided, the buffer-view contains animation or skin data.  WebGL: see bindBuffer().
